description: This trap is generated for NTP Server
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-NTP-MIB::usrNTPServerFailure USR-NTP-MIB::usrNTPPrimaryServer s EXAMPLE USR-NTP-MIB::usrNTPSecondaryServer s EXAMPLE

description: The IP address or host name of the primary NTP server that the
module will query for time synchronization.
An empty string means that no primary server is defined.
variables.name: USR-NTP-MIB::usrNTPPrimaryServer

description: The IP address or host name of the secondary NTP server that the
module will query for time synchronization whenever the primary
An empty string means that no secondary server is defined.
variables.name: USR-NTP-MIB::usrNTPSecondaryServer
